application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Details required for Condition 1 (Cycle Parking) and 2 (Car Park Management) of planning permission 19/02847/PAO2R (Change of use from office (Class B1) to a Dwellinghouse (Class C3).
decision_conditions: Condition 1 (cycle parking) - The applicant has provided insufficient information including any images or specifications for the secure cycle parking. As such officers are unable to support Condition 1 being discharged at this time.

Condition 2 (Car Park Management) - The applicant's cover letter on parking simply states that it is a car-free development, this does not constitute an acceptable car park management plan as required. The applicant has also not provided any evidence that the necessary unilateral undertaking is in place, under which future occupiers would be precluded from obtaining resident permits for the Controlled Parking Zone (CPZ). Again, therefore, officers would not support Condition 2 being discharged at this time.
